channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 14:29 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 14:29 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 14:13 Driven anxiety in the Dnieper district.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 14:13 Driven anxiety in the Dnieper district.Creck on further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 14:13 Driven the alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya territorial community. Salt for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 14:13 Driven the alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya territorial community. Salt for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 14:13 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Dniprovsky rayon-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivsk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 14:13 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Dniprovsky rayon-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivsk territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 14:00 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291#Kupyansky_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
